tasks.title: AgentScope - Real-Time Agent Activity Monitor
tasks.description:
OBJECTIVE: Build AgentScope - a comprehensive, real-time web dashboard to monitor ALL agent activity with intelligent classification and agent-specific panes.

AGENTSCOPE SPECIFICATIONS:

1. INTELLIGENT LOGGER & CLASSIFICATION:
   - Captures EVERYTHING: tool calls, internal thinking messages, Telegram responses, user messages, agent-to-agent messages
   - Auto-classifies each event type:
     * tool_call - when agent executes a tool
     * thinking - internal reasoning/thought process
     * response - message sent to Telegram/user
     * user_message - message received from user
     * agent_message - message from other agents
     * decision - agent makes a decision
     * skill_use - agent uses a skill
   - Each event shows: timestamp, session ID, event type, content summary

2. AGENT PANES (One per spawned agent):
   - Main session agent always visible
   - One pane for each active sub-agent
   - Each pane header shows:
     * Agent name (derived from task/project/label)
     * Model being used (e.g., kimi-k2.5, claude-opus)
     * Last update timestamp (e.g., '2 min ago')
     * Live/dead status indicator

3. 10-MINUTE TIMEOUT & ARCHIVING:
   - Active agents: last activity within 10 minutes
   - After 10 min of inactivity → moved to 'Archived Agents' page
   - Separate page/view for archived/dead agents
   - Main dashboard only shows ACTIVE agents

4. REVERSE CHRONOLOGICAL FEED (Newest at TOP):
   - Unlike typical chat (oldest at top), AgentScope shows NEWEST events at top
   - Each agent pane displays its event stream
   - Events shown:
     * Tool calls (tool name, params, result preview)
     * Thinking messages (reasoning process)
     * Skills being used
     * Decisions being made
     * Responses being sent
     * User messages received
   - Auto-scroll to keep newest visible

5. DATA SOURCES TO INTEGRATE:
   - /root/.openclaw/workspace/data/actions.jsonl - streaming events
   - /root/.openclaw/agents/main/sessions/*.jsonl - session transcripts
   - openclaw sessions list --json - live session metadata
   - /root/.openclaw/workspace/logs/activity-stream.jsonl - activity logs

6. VISUAL DESIGN:
   - Dark theme (distinct from previous monitors)
   - Color-coded event types
   - Collapsible/expandable agent panes
   - Responsive layout (grid of agent cards)
   - Main session highlighted prominently

CONSTRAINTS:
- Start in BACKLOG only - do NOT move to in_progress without explicit approval
- Must handle high-frequency updates efficiently
- Must not impact agent performance
- Use existing Flask server (monitor_server.py) as base

DELIVERABLES:
1. AgentScope architecture with event classification system
2. Backend event aggregator/parser from multiple sources
3. Real-time SSE streaming endpoint
4. Frontend with agent panes and reverse chronological feeds
5. Active/Archived agent management with 10-min timeout
6. Deployment and validation

SUCCESS CRITERIA:
- Anthony sees live AgentScope with all agent panes
- Every tool call, thought, response visible and classified
- Newest events appear at top of each pane
- Agents auto-archive after 10 min inactivity
- Main session and all sub-agents visible with names, models, timestamps
